title: Why can't I get chests anymore?
body:
Hey, I'm a lowly free to play league player, and because of this I rely on boxes from getting S ranks and champion shards to get my new champions. 

However, lately that hasn't been happening. I've gotten numerous S rankings on several different champions, from support to top lane and haven't gotten one single chest. I don't even get them anymore from when my teammates get an S+ (because everyone gets a chest then, right?) I have had all 4 chests queued up for 3 weeks now and haven't gotten anything since.

Does it have to do with the new client? Is it a bug? Is the loot system broken?

If someone could help me out that'd be magical, thanks.

replies.body: On your profile it'll show if you have any available. Only 4 a month, only one per champion a season.
Your rewards get disabled for a time when you get chat restriction for your behavior ;D

> [{quoted}](name=LiteUpSketchers,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rLEFRMFp,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-29T19:27:45.621+0000)
>
> Hey, I'm a lowly free to play league player, and because of this I rely on boxes from getting S ranks and champion shards to get my new champions.

I don't even get them anymore from when my teammates get an S+ (because everyone gets a chest then, right?) I have had all 4 chests queued up for 3 weeks now and haven't gotten anything since.
> 
> Does it have to do with the new client? Is it a bug? Is the loot system broken?
> 
> If someone could help me out that'd be magical, thanks.

go to your profile. see that chest icon? hover over it, and it'll give you all the info you need.
https://gyazo.com/b87febb7ff27278910e363ae43dc1898

Hmmm, I see chest acquired on a champ and it says highest rank this season B+, that doesn't make sense if you need an S to earn a chest does it? Could it be that mine are stuck and need to be reset? I swear I haven't got chests for any of the champs that say I have this season. Anybody else notice this? I have been punished a few times in the behavior system, could that be why?

> [{quoted}](name=Ima Cut U Up,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rLEFRMFp,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-06T23:48:13.394+0000)
>
> Hmmm, I see chest acquired on a champ and it says highest rank this season B+, that doesn't make sense if you need an S to earn a chest does it? Could it be that mine are stuck and need to be reset? I swear I haven't got chests for any of the champs that say I have this season. Anybody else notice this? I have been punished a few times in the behavior system, could that be why?

you also get chests if your premades get s scores. and yes behavior penalties means you can't get chests or mastery tokens but i would think the score would still update
In collection, if there is a gold border around the champion, you have gotten a chest on them this season and cannot do so again until the season ends.
